title: Scuba Steve Was Asked To Be On Reality TV + Listener’s Son Wants To Be A Sports Announcer + Will Eddie’s Wife Let Him Get A Motorcycle?
itunes:title: Scuba Steve Was Asked To Be On Reality TV + Listener’s Son Wants To Be A Sports Announcer + Will Eddie’s Wife Let Him Get A Motorcycle?
description:
Scuba Steve reveals he was once offered a spot on 'Real World'...which has been Lunchbox’s life-long dream! Bobby opens up the listener mailbag and reads an email from a listener who wants to know if her son has what it takes to be a sports broadcaster. Plus, Eddie gives us an update on whether or not his wife will let him get a motorcycle!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
